Package qlearning

There are several ways to store or compute state/action values.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IDefaultValueChooser When no values are yet stored for a (s,a) couple, the IRewardStore (or its implemented classes) asks this class for a default value to return.
IRewardStore Framework defining methods to store, retrieve, enumerate state/action values.
ValueIteration Every problem where the set of states can be enumerated might implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
ActionStatePair Acts like a key to store Q(s,a) values.
ConstantValueChooser  
Eligibles Memorizing eligibility traces.
IntervalValueChooser  
NullValueChooser  
RewardMemorizer Memorizing Q(s,a) in HashMap.
RewardMemorizerInteger For storing integer approwimations of Q(s,a) The paper defining the algorithm
RewardMemorizerNN Memorizing Q(s,a) in a neural network.
RewardMemorizerNNSinglePass Samples are not memorized : each time a new experience is available, the neural network is asked to train.
 

Package qlearning Description

There are several ways to store or compute state/action values.
